languages.text: "Считаю своим долгом подчеркнуть, что то, что эти простолюдины примкнули к нам, а не к мятежу — просто чудо. Ради всего святого, не вздумайте после этого вооружать всю чернь на корабле, Лорд-капитан".
"I must emphasise that it is a miracle that these commoners have joined us and not the rebellion. For the Emperor's sake, do not go arming every commoner on the ship after this, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Считаю своим долгом подчеркнуть, что то, что эти простолюдины примкнули к нам, а не к мятежу — просто чудо. Ради всего святого, не вздумайте после этого вооружать всю чернь на корабле, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "I must emphasise that it is a miracle that these commoners have joined us and not the rebellion. For Emperor's sake, don't go arming all the commoners on the ship after this, Lord Captain."
"I must emphasise that it is a miracle that these commoners have joined us and not the rebellion. For Emperor's sake, don't go arming all the commoners on the ship after this, Lord Captain."
"I must emphasise that it is a miracle that these commoners have joined us and not the rebellion. For Emperor's sake, do not go arming every commoner on the ship after this, Lord Captain."

"I must emphasise that it is a miracle that these commoners have joined us and not the rebellion. For the Emperor's sake, do not go arming every commoner on the ship after this, Lord Captain."
"I must emphasise that it is a miracle that these commoners have joined us and not the rebellion. For the Emperor's sake, do not go arming every commoner on the ship after this, Lord Captain."

languages.text: «Debo enfatizar que es un milagro que estos rebeldes se unieran a nosotros y no a la revuelta. Por el Emperador, no se le ocurra armar a todos los plebeyos de la nave después de esto, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "I must emphasise that it is a miracle that these commoners have joined us and not the rebellion. For the Emperor's sake, do not go arming every commoner on the ship after this, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Debo enfatizar que es un milagro que estos rebeldes se unieran a nosotros y no a la revuelta. Por el Emperador, no se le ocurra armar a todos los plebeyos de la nave después de esto, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「この平民たちが反乱軍ではなく、こちらに加わったのは奇跡的なことだ。皇帝のためにも、これから船内の平民全員に武装させるようなことはしないでくれ、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "I must emphasise that it is a miracle that these commoners have joined us and not the rebellion. For the Emperor's sake, do not go arming every commoner on the ship after this, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「この平民たちが反乱軍ではなく、こちらに加わったのは奇跡的なことだ。皇帝のためにも、これから船内の平民全員に武装させるようなことはしないでくれ、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: “请允许我强调这一点——这些平民没有加入叛军，而是与我们并肩作战，这完完全全就是个奇迹。看在帝皇的份上，舰长大人，千万别因为这件事情就给船上的每个船员都发放武器。”
languages.original_text: "I must emphasise that it is a miracle that these commoners have joined us and not the rebellion. For the Emperor's sake, do not go arming every commoner on the ship after this, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “请允许我强调这一点——这些平民没有加入叛军，而是与我们并肩作战，这完完全全就是个奇迹。看在帝皇的份上，舰长大人，千万别因为这件事情就给船上的每个船员都发放武器。”

languages.text: "Ich muss betonen, dass es ein Wunder ist, dass sich dieser Pöbel uns angeschlossen hat und nicht der Rebellion. Beim Imperator, bitte bewaffnet nicht plötzlich jeden einfachen Arbeiter auf dem Schiff, wenn das ausgestanden ist, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "I must emphasise that it is a miracle that these commoners have joined us and not the rebellion. For the Emperor's sake, do not go arming every commoner on the ship after this, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ich muss betonen, dass es ein Wunder ist, dass sich dieser Pöbel uns angeschlossen hat und nicht der Rebellion. Beim Imperator, bitte bewaffnet nicht plötzlich jeden einfachen Arbeiter auf dem Schiff, wenn das ausgestanden ist, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « Je me dois de souligner qu'il tient du miracle que ces roturiers se soient joint à nous, et non à la rébellion. Pour l'amour de l'Empereur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je vous implore de ne pas vous mettre en tête d'armer tous les prolétaires du vaisseau lorsque tout ceci sera terminé. »
languages.original_text: "I must emphasise that it is a miracle that these commoners have joined us and not the rebellion. For the Emperor's sake, do not go arming every commoner on the ship after this, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Je me dois de souligner qu'il tient du miracle que ces roturiers se soient joint à nous, et non à la rébellion. Pour l'amour de l'Empereur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, je vous implore de ne pas vous mettre en tête d'armer tous les prolétaires du vaisseau lorsque tout ceci sera terminé. »

languages.text: "Altını çizmeliyim ki bu sıradan yurttaşların isyancılara değil de bize katılmış olması, gerçek bir mucizedir. İmparator aşkına, bundan sonra gemideki herkesi silahlandırmak gibi bir hataya düşmeyin Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "I must emphasise that it is a miracle that these commoners have joined us and not the rebellion. For the Emperor's sake, do not go arming every commoner on the ship after this, Lord Captain."
